name: Brick'd Out
description:
Break in with Brick'd Out! These fancy flashing futuristic bricks just don't sit right with you, so take them all out and become supreme! Just don't lose your ball or they'll laugh at you all the way home.

Made for Ludum Dare 47 so rate and leave feedback if you also made a game!

Developed by Game Endeavor

Music by Matthew Pablo:
http://www.matthewpablo.com
